title: [Cancer] Researchers have uncovered promising findings that Kencur extract, a tropical plant in the ginger family native to Southeast Asia, possesses anti-cancer effects by significantly suppressing cancer cell growth at the cellular and animal levels

[Health] Prescribing fruits and vegetables to adults and children is associated with increased consumption of these foods and multiple health benefits. Benefits included improved body mass index, blood sugar and blood pressure levels, researchers found, as well as a decrease in food insecurity.
